longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
  5 years) passports. 
- Passport replacing documents issued to nationals of France
  must be valid on arrival. 
- Nationals of France are allowed to enter with expired (max.
  5 years) National ID Cards issued  
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of France.
  

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Mayotte will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Mayotte are expected to hold
  their own travel document
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
- Holders of a certificate of contraindication on medical
  grounds. 
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis. Malaria risk (P. vivax and P.
  falciparum) is high throughout the year in the
  municipalities bordering Brazil (Oiapoque river valley) and
  Suriname (Maroni river valley). In the other municipalities
  transmission risk is low or negligible. Recommended
  prevention in risk areas: C.
